## Case enum

Types of upper/lower casing of strings.

 {<!-- -->number<!-- -->}

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum Case 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  initcap | <code>3</code> | Represents initial capitalization (initcap) of strings. |
|  lower | <code>1</code> | Represents lower casing of strings. |
|  mixed | <code>0</code> | Represents mixed casing of strings. |
|  upper | <code>2</code> | Represents upper casing of strings. |
